en:
wasd   - movement 
 f,q     - run 
 Double tap wsad - run 
 Enter - Pause

k         - light attack 
 i         - heavy attack 
 l         -  jump 
 o,p,j - block
+ or . - volume up \n - or , - volume down

x - light 
       attack 

 y - heavy 
       attack 

 a - jump 

 b - block, 
       back
